queries.query:
from(bucket: "LampLogs")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lamp_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ldr")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "LampLogs")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lamp_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ldr")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LampLogs")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lamp_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "confidence")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["label"] == "on")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp1" or r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp2" or r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp3" or r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp4")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LampLogs")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lamp_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ldr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LampLogs")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lamp_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "confidence")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["label"] == "off")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp1" or r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp2" or r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp3" or r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp4")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LampLogs")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lamp_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "confidence")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["label"] == "off")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp1" or r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp2" or r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp3" or r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp4")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "LampLogs")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lamp_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ldr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["label"] == "on" or r["label"] == "off")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp2")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LampLogs")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lamp_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "confidence" or r["_field"] == "ldr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["label"] == "on" or r["label"] == "off")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp1" or r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp2" or r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp3" or r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp4")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "LampLogs")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lamp_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ldr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp3")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LampLogs")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lamp_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ldr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["lamp_id"] == "Lamp4")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
